skills.definition: Choose an adjacent obstacle and remove it. All characters adjacent to that obstacle take 1 Wound.

skills.name: Jet Wings
skills.definition: Move actions performed by Turbodactyl use jump rules. Turbodactyl can spend 2 Mana to move adjacent characters with it. The Chosen characters movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Dinosaur Beak
skills.definition:
Test Strength against Toughness of an enemy within 2 hexes.
            1 success: 1 wound.
            2 successes: 1 wound and Push the target 2 hexes.
            3 successes: 2 wounds and Push the target 2 hexes.

skills.name: The Throne
skills.definition:
Upon activation, if Zodac has at least:
            1 Wound, gain 1 Mana,
            3 wound, gain Focus,
            6 wound, gain Action.

skills.name: The Guardian
skills.definition: If any character within 12" takes at least 1 Wound, Zodac takes 1 of those Wounds on himself.

skills.name: Snake in the Grass
skills.definition: Place a Hsss within 12". When any character within 2 hexes from a Hsss is about to end its activation, it must perform a free move action towards King Hsss.

skills.name: Dreadful and Disguised
skills.definition: Immediately after an ally ends an interruption, King Hsss can spend 2 Mana and interrupt the same character.

skills.name: Fight Back!
skills.definition: Upon Fang-Or's interruption from trigger fate card, he receives 1 extra Action.

skills.name: Ambush!
skills.definition: Alternative Deployment. At the beginning of the second or consecutive round, you can deploy Fang-Or in any deployment zone, at least 7 hexes from an enemy.

skills.name: Camoulflage
skills.definition: At the end of Kobra Khan's interruption from a trigger fate card, you can remove him from the table and redeploy him at the beginning of the next round.

skills.name: Hypnotic Mist
skills.definition: Place a Khan token within 12". Stength, Perception, and Power of characters within 2 hexes from Khan token are reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 3).

skills.name: Shedding Skin
skills.definition: Place a Slither and a non-Slither within 8" at least 3 hexes away from any character. When a Slither Token is about to be removed, Lady Slither is teleported to any hex adjacent to it.

skills.name: Deadly Assassin
skills.definition: Alternative deployment. At the beginning of the first round, place Slither and non-slither anywhere on the battleground, at least 6 hexes from any character or objective token.

skills.name: Snake Magic
skills.definition: Choose a Mark within 16" and test Power +2. Move the chosen Mark up to 1 hex per Success.

skills.name: Battle Rattle
skills.definition: Place a Rattlor token within 12". Toughness and Mind of characters within 2 hexes from Rattlor token are increased by 1 (to a maximum of 3).

skills.name: Dirty Tricks
skills.definition: Whenever your force resolves an interruption from a trigger fate card, Sssqueeze gains a Focus.

skills.name: Elongated Arms
skills.definition: Sssqueeze's Melee attacks can target enemies within 2 hexes (assuming they are in line of sight), even if they are not engaged with him.

skills.name: Serpent's Rage
skills.definition: After King Hsss is attacked, he can spend 2 Mana to interrupt the attacker.

skills.name: Tyrantisaurus Bite
skills.definition: Test Strength against Toughness of an enemy engaged w/ or interruption, gain +2 Die. 2 Successes: 1 Wound; 3 Successes: 2 Wounds
